Text:
Thanks for the upload!

Could you please rename this torrent and the following torrents for this series to include the standard episode format?

For example, instead of:
RuPauls.Drag.Race.All.Stars.E01.It.Takes.Two.HDRip.XviD.avi
please use
RuPauls.Drag.Race.All.Stars.S01E01.It.Takes.Two.HDRip.XviD.avi
so that automatic downloading clients can recognise the episodes?

You can also do this for untucked :)
RuPauls.Drag.Race.All.Stars.Untucked.S01E01.HDRip.XviD.avi

Thank you!
